CustomField.description: Field to capture the value of Desired shipment/ install timeline value from its corresponding value in CRF.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Autopopulated once Customer Readiness Form is created and "Desired Shipment/Install Timelines" field is populated. Customer Readiness Form is only required if opportunity contains an instrument.
CustomField.label: Desired Shipment/Install Timelines - CRF
